DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the effect of luteal phase supplement (LPS) on pregnancy rate in IUI cycles stimulated with clomiphene citrate.
DOC.brief_title: Luteal Support and Intrauterine Insemination (IUI) With Clomiphene Citrate
DOC.criteria: Age ≤ 36 years Body mass index between 18 and 29 Presence of both ovaries Basal levels of estradiol (≤ 80 pg/ml) and progesterone (≤ 1.6ng/ml) on day one of the cycle and a day three FSH level of <12IU/L Patients can enter the study only once. Only the first IUI attempt will be included ( at the 2nd and 3 rd attempt progesterone could be administrated if it is necessary but these attempts will be excluded from the study) Normal HSG (maximum 3 months prior starting the stimulation). Donor sperm can be included Polycystic ovarian syndrome (Rotterdam criteria) Endometriosis(≥AFS III)
